name: io.github.Pranavj17/mcp-server-graylog
description: Search Graylog logs by timestamps, filter by streams, and debug production issues.

tools.name: search_logs_absolute
tools.description: Search Graylog logs using absolute timestamps (from/to). Perfect for debugging errors with specific timestamps from monitoring tools.

tools.name: search_logs_relative
tools.description: Search Graylog logs using relative time range (e.g., last 15 minutes). Useful for recent log analysis.

tools.name: list_streams
tools.description: List all available Graylog streams (applications). Use this to discover stream IDs for filtering.

tools.name: get_system_info
tools.description: Get Graylog system information and health status. Use this to verify connectivity.
